snippet: World no. 3 platinum producer Lonmin said it anticipated a "mass return to work" on Wednesday at its strike-hit South African operations, according to an internal company memo to employees....

headline.print_headline: Lonmin Expects Mass Return at Strike-Hit South Africa Platinum Mines
headline.main: Lonmin Expects Mass Return at Strike-Hit South Africa Platinum Mines

lead_paragraph: World no. 3 platinum producer Lonmin said it anticipated a "mass return to work" on Wednesday at its strike-hit South African operations, according to an internal company memo to employees.
